main event: A civilian reported observing a high altitude balloon that was verified by multiple airport officials.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 16 minutes from the Indianapolis Airport until the balloon disappeared from sight., The object was tracked by Doppler aircraft at approximately 150,000 feet., Witnesses included two adults who noted a red saucer-shaped object hovering before speeding off., The initial assumption was that the object was a UFO, but it was later concluded to be a balloon., The sighting spurred multiple inquiries to various air force bases regarding balloon launches.
witness description: Report from a civilian and observations by airport personnel
